name: Catch Me If I Fall -- Linen and Fiber Wall Hanging with Stylized Gingko Leaf Meditative Fiber Art
description:
Was $35.00 NOW 25% OFF! The ginkgo with its delicate fan-shaped leaf is symbolic of longevity. I was inspired by Asian art, textiles and calligraphy scroll while creating this piece. This was created in an intuitive state of flow, of meditation, with very little measuring, pre-planning or design. 

A coarse-weave natural colored linen cloth panel with gently frayed edges is the foundation for this wall art. I have layered harmoniously colored, patterned and textured pieces of cloth to the linen panel using a combination of hand stitching and machining. The aqua blue print creates a splash of color to the mostly neutral palette of the whole construction, and adds a fresh modern element. The stylised gingko leaf in rich, chocolate brown is soft corduroy. Simple tab-top hangers. Lots of frayed edges, rustic appeal and overall meditative quality. 

Measurements: Hanging is approximately 9 inches wide x 15.5 inches length (22.8cm x 39.3cm). I have initialed & dated this piece on the back. Care: Spot-cleaning recommended only, if necessary. **NOTE:the branch shown as hanging/display is NOT included.**

Made in my tranquil smoke-free, animal-loving studio. A little work of art from my heart to yours! Ships from Norway to everywhere!

name: Happiness Blessing Polymer Clay Handmade Stylized Leaf Pendant Necklace
description:
Was $20.00 NOW 25% OFF! A single leaf is a symbol of happiness.

Using thoroughly conditioned polymer clay I have hand cut, shaped and textured this stylized leaf to make the pendant. After baking, I used layers of fine artist acrylic paints in blues, greens and metallic bronze to create the rich coloring and patina.  I've applied several layers of protective high gloss varnish for long-lasting finish and shine.  The pendant, with antiqued bronze rings, hangs from a length of deliciously chocolate brown colored velvet ribbon to tie at the neck. 

This necklace has a wonderful rustic, tribal essence...

Measurements: Leaf pendant is approximately 3 inches long x 1/4 inch thick (7.6cm x 0.6cm). Velvet ribbon is 35 inches length, and is 1/4 inch wide (88cm x 0.6cm). All metals and findings are antiqued brass, which are lead-free / nickel-free.

Made in my tranquil smoke-free, animal-loving studio. A little work of art from my heart to yours! Ships from Norway to everywhere!
